name: late night driver
description:
update!
added an android version I was testing out.
- tilt control
- press 2 fingers on screen at once to start
- It tries to load .mp3 files from the android Music folder ('Internal Storage/Music'?) and play them. If it can't find any... i guess it is silent!!
- 3 fingers at once to skip to the next song



a short arcade game i made a few years ago

its sort of like air hockey

there is an invisible combo system that resets if you collide with any oncoming traffic so avoid that!!!

reuploading because the only version available was a web player build on gamejolt

press M to toggle music

music by thomas gainer. check out his other stuff
https://velvetbison.bandcamp.com/
https://enchantress.bandcamp.com/album/visualize
